result.eng: The aerplane suddenly landed on the ground.
result.ga: thuirling an t-eitleán ar thalamh de phlimp
result.orig: thuirling an t-eitleán ar thalamh de phlimp
result.html: thuirling an t-eitleán ar thalamh de phlimpThe aerplane suddenly landed on the ground.
result.ponchtml: ṫuirling an t-eitleán ar ṫalaṁ de ṗlimpThe aerplane suddenly landed on the ground.

result.eng: Her husband died suddenly last year, God have mercy on him.
result.ga: cailleadh a fear céile go tobann anuraidh beannacht dé leis
result.orig: cailleadh a fear céile go tobann anuraidh beannacht dé leis
result.html: cailleadh a fear céile go tobann anuraidh beannacht dé leisHer husband died suddenly last year, God have mercy on him.
result.ponchtml: cailleaḋ a fear céile go tobann anuraiḋ beannaċt dé leisHer husband died suddenly last year, God have mercy on him.

result.ga: fuair sé bás tobann gan choinne
result.orig: fuair sé bás tobann gan choinne
result.html: fuair sé bás tobann gan choinneHe died suddenly and unexpectedly.
result.ponchtml: fuair sé bás tobann gan ċoinneHe died suddenly and unexpectedly.

result.eng: Those strange questions were suddenly cleared out of my mind.
result.ga: glanadh na ceisteanna aisteacha seo amach as m'intinn go tobann
result.orig: glanadh na ceisteanna aisteacha seo amach as m'intinn go tobann
result.html: glanadh na ceisteanna aisteacha seo amach as m'intinn go tobannThose strange questions were suddenly cleared out of my mind.
result.ponchtml: glanaḋ na ceisteanna aisteaċa seo amaċ as m'intinn go tobannThose strange questions were suddenly cleared out of my mind.
